677f4a2a-4ca6-4cda-b07b-67b7de9b91c4.description: The Servsafe Food Handler certification provides students with the fundamental food safety knowledge and training required for those employees who handle food professionally. The coursework is multifaceted with real-world examples that reinforce important food safety concepts. The coursework and exam have been developed based upon the FSA Food Code - guidance issued by the federal government for jurisdictions to establish scientifically sound food handling requirements for their own districts.
677f4a2a-4ca6-4cda-b07b-67b7de9b91c4.name: Food Services and Operations Program

issuer.summary: issued by Eastside Career Development Center

alignments.name: American National Standards Institute
alignments.description: The National Restuarant Association provides accreditation for ServSafe certification, which is more than required by state law. The Conference for Food Protection (CFP) and ANSI (the American National Standards Institute) accredits the ServSafe Certification process.

badge_template_activities.title: The ServSafe Certification and training program was developed and is currently administered by the National Restuarant Association  ServSafe certification is a training program that was developed to maintain the standards and safety of the professional workers in the restaurant/service industry.  The purpose of the certification is to ensure that all food service workers understand the issues surrounding food safety and ensure these food and beverages workers comply with federal and state laws.

Customer Service Survival Skills Module 1 Understanding the Worst-Case Scenarios; Module 2 Problem Solving and Putting into Action; Module 3 Your Worst Customer Situation; Module 4 Framing Your Response for a Resolution.

Dealing with Difficult People Module 1 - Getting to Know the People you Can't Stand; Module 2 Surviving through Skillful Communication; Module 3 Bringing out the Best in People at their Worst; Module 4 Communication in a Digital Age.

Increase Your Emotional Intelligence Module 1 What Are Emotions; Module 2 The Components of Emotional Intelligence; Module 3 Seven Steps to Emotional Intelligence; Module 4 Emotional Intelligence at Work,

b5ed3539-ff49-410b-aee6-e385a3e5ddae.description: For those new using Zoom/MSO to teaching online, or those already teaching online. Get the best instruction from the foremost authorities in online learning. Thousands of people have taken this fundamental yet advanced training online. Come away with practical, how-to tips and techniques, plus the pedagogy of Live Online teaching. Taught by one of the foremost technology instructionals of adults.
b5ed3539-ff49-410b-aee6-e385a3e5ddae.name: Online Zoom & MSO Advanced Training

issuer.summary: issued by Eastside Career Development Center

alignments.name: Learning in an Era of Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Internet basics principles behind the adoption of technology innovation The nature of the online learning environment.  Envisioning Your Online Presence using MSO Teams and Zoom.  Preparing for the move to the Web Analyzing your the features through both platforms for success teaching, business meetings, and organization engagement for the 21st Century. Planning your web course Identifying resources.  Design guidelines. Online collaboration and creating an interactive environment Motivating.

66df073b-1a96-4979-8b0e-127155706915.description: In this course, you will learn objectives and practices for a good Supply Chain. How to balance the trade-offs and knowing the difference between efficient and responsive supply chains and why they can be both. Business operations come in all shapes and sizes with a host of unique challenges, but good supply chain management is essential to them all. Whether you work in retail, manufacturing production, distribution, logistics, or even service companies.
66df073b-1a96-4979-8b0e-127155706915.name: Distribution and Warehouse Certificate with OSHA Certification Program

issuer.summary: issued by Eastside Career Development Center

alignments.name: CPDW
alignments.description: The Certified Professional in Distribution and Warehousing (CPDW) program is designed to educate and train people in distribution, logistics, and warehousing management. This portion of the training is in partnership with ePearson via PF International.

badge_template_activities.title: Fundamentals of Logistics, Supply Chain and Customer Services
